Name: Dumb Little Robots
About the game: Dumb Little Robots is a 2d puzzle game where you control robots that each have a single function. Help them work together to solve tricky levels. Meet new robots as you go and learn how they change the possibilities! Start simply... Get complex! Levels play out on grids, and primarily feature pushing, rotating, destroying, and copying robots to solve. If you find yourself stuck, DON'T PANIC. This game features a hint button! And then panic anyway, as you may find the assistance sometimes less than helpful. Includes 51 levels, divided between 6 tutorial levels and 45 main levels. Levels are clustered into groups of 9 that can be completed in any order.
